chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
hey
awesome! so, we're at the starting point near a twig
a small island with a tiger is on our left. where to next, buddy?
we go to the island with the parrot and the elephant
alright, we are now on the big island with the parrot on a tree and an elephant
what's our next move, captain?
let go over the rocks unto the next island with the frog on it.
roger that! we've hopped over the rocks and now we're on a new island with a frog
what's the next step?
Now thins is tricky, but we need to got over the gator to the dark rock on the  big island again
alright, tricky indeed! okay, we've managed to get past the crocodile and we're back on the big island with the elephant
where to now?
and then over to the giraffe
gotcha! now we're hanging out near the giraffe
what's up next?

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
Hey
awesome! let's do this
from our white dog buddy at the top-right, take a few steps to the left, buddy, going below that wooden bench and across the trail towards the florist stand. got it?
yeAH GOT IT
perfect! now hit a u-turn left without reaching the florist stand
head back towards our white doggie friend, crossing back over the trail. fun, right?
Headed back to the white dog
what next?
super! now, proceed across the branch southwards
ever feel like you're playing pac-man on this map? keep going down until you see another white dog. they're having a picnic, cute, right?
alright, step over the picnic mat and slightly brush that bowl of berries with your hand as you pass it
then head to the west, got it?
Okay, ober the log and next to the other white dog.
What next?
yep, you're doing great! next, there's a wooden branch up ahead
cross the river again, this time heading north. ready to get those shoes a little muddy?
great! now carefully circle the green bush on your right
steer clear of its leaves, and head towards that florist stand you can see there
Great! around the bush and at the florist stand
WHat next?
sweeet! now turn left and go below the stand
can you see a big bridge with two cyclists? pass that bridge heading west
straight ahead and slightly left you will see two senior peeps chillin' on a bench, engrossed in their newspapers
continue past them!
Okay, continued past the senior citizens. Now at the deer
What next?
wait a minute! before the deer, you should have gone south a few steps, right between the old folks and another wooden branch
did you see a green bush next to the end of the branch?
next, head east between the branch and the bush
careful not to trip! you're doing great
okay. There now
what next?
fantastic! now just a few easy steps east, and voila! say hello to our cute little deer friend! you've done great!
guess what, buddy? you've made it! that brown, adorable deer is our final destination! how was it? fun, i hope!
It was great fun

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
HI
¡impresionante! Estoy empezando en la tienda del norte.
Veo un perro junto a un incendio al sur de aquí. ¿Cómo procedo?
Da la vuelta al fuego, al coche y luego al telescopio
perfecto, entonces giro alrededor del fuego, veo el coche rojo y voy más al sur hacia el telescopio azul
¿qué viene después, amigo?
vuelve al auto otra vez
vale, vuelvo al coche azul
y ahora, ¿qué sigue?
Da la vuelta al monte cerca del coche y vuelve al telescopio.
genial, rodeo el monte y volví al telescopio azul
¿y ahora qué?
Pasa por las rocas y entra a la casa.
pasé por las rocas y ¡voilá! aquí está la casa de madera
*terminado* deberíamos jugar de nuevo, ¿no te parece?

chat.msg: hola, you ready?
Hola, I'm ready
awesome! first, head southwest below the first palm tree, then turn right past the second one
before reaching the third palm, make a quick left turn and continue south. you got it?
Got it. Continuing south
What next?
good job! when you see a brown puppy, walk to its left - then make a slight left and a right turn towards the south
you with me?
right on, next you'll cross between a big and small rock
after that, dive right into the water, don't be shy!
Whew! In the water now
What next?
atta boy! now, head towards the oversized red crab, then bear right and follow along the big rock
keep to the west buddy!
perfect, watch for a medium rock and then a shark
when you see the shark, sharp turn to your right!
AT the over sized crab.
What next?
great! now, bear right and follow along the big rock
head west in the water!
steady there! watch for a medium rock and then a shark
when you see the shark, make a sharp turn to your right
Done
What next?
cool! now, head back onto land between the medium rock and a blue-yellow-white ball, then keep going north
alright, mate! now tweak your direction slightly to the left and head towards the northwest
Headed northwest
where to now?
good on ya! pass between the little red tent on your left and the big speaker on your right
can you see them?
great! wrap around the tent, giving it a nice arc
done
What next?
super! head south towards the sea, but hang a right at the shore and walk under the red kayak instead
you managing that?
perfect! now take a sharp right turn to the north, stroll along the kayak until you reach a small green bush
and. Voila, you made it! it's been quite the adventure, hasn't it?
yes
awesome! thanks for playing along, pal
great job navigating, you're a natural!
Thanks. You too
thanks, mate! i had a blast
let's do it again sometime!

general_survey.answer: I don't really think anything. I guess I just think of it as normal.
